name: react-vite-microfrontend
description: Micro-frontend architecture with React and Vite

scripts.hmr: concurrently "npm run dev:host" "npm run dev:mf1" "npm run dev:mf2" "npm run dev:mf3" "npm run dev:mf4" "npm run dev:mf5" "npm run dev:mf6" "npm run dev:mf7"
scripts.dev: npm run build:remotes && concurrently "npm run dev:host" "npm run preview:remotes"
scripts.preview:remotes: concurrently "npm run preview:mf1" "npm run preview:mf2" "npm run preview:mf3" "npm run preview:mf4" "npm run preview:mf5" "npm run preview:mf6" "npm run preview:mf7"
scripts.build: npm run build:remotes && npm run build:host
scripts.build:remotes: npm run build:mf1 && npm run build:mf2 && npm run build:mf3 && npm run build:mf4 && npm run build:mf5 && npm run build:mf6 && npm run build:mf7
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:host && npm run install:mf1 && npm run install:mf2 && npm run install:mf3 && npm run install:mf4 && npm run install:mf5 && npm run install:mf6 && npm run install:mf7
